item_id.description: Item ID (context-specific). item_id should be the item's UPC code, if available. If UPC is not available, item_id should be the item's SKU ID. If neither UPC nor SKU are available, the value should be an empty string.

item_name.description: The name of the item. One of item_id or item_name is required.

affiliation.description: A product affiliation to designate a supplying company or brick and mortar store location.

coupon.description: Coupon code associated with an item.

discount.description: The monetary discount value associated with the item.

gtin.description: The Global Trade Identification Number (GTIN) assigned to the item.

index.description: The index/position of the item in a list.

item_brand.description: The brand associated with the item.

item_list_id.description: The computer-readable machine name of the list the item showed up in (if sent with a view_item_list event). Use UUID provided by the component if no more specific ID is available.

item_list_name.description: The human-readable name of the item list the item showed up in (if sent with a view_item_list event). If one is not available, populate with numerical index of which list this is on the page (1-indexed).

item_out_of_stock.description: Set as true only if an item is out of stock. Exclude this parameter if the item is in stock.

item_upc.description: The UPC code of the product.

location_id.description: The location associated with the event. If possible, set to the Google Place ID that corresponds to the associated item. Can also be overridden to a custom location ID string.
